title: Star Trek TNG S02E01-E06 Super repack 1GB **test**
description:
Here are 6 episodes of Star Trek TNG Season 2 (the first 6).

This is a test to see if others like these repacks. I repacked them from 3.27 GB files (X264, dts 1509kbps) to 1GB file size. This to save a lot of disk space. I used handbrake to try to approximate the quality delivered in the 3.3 GB files. The audio I re-encoded from DTS to AC3 because AC3 delivers equal audio quality at 640 kbps, although DTS surely delivers better surround experience. In this case i sacrificed that for smaller file size, which is the goal here.

I have already compared the two formats and i can see very little to no quality loss. Even the grain is retained (mostly).

Please download a couple of episodes and comment below what you think of them. If reactions are positive i will continue and repacks ALL TNG episodes that are available in HD to this file size and format.

Here are the encoding specs for those who like tech info:

Application : Handbrake 0.9.9.5530 64-bit
x264 codec set at High 4.0, tuned for grain, 2-Pass encoding, slower setting.
Video Bitrate: 2432 kbps
Audio Bitrate: 640 kbps (AC3 ffmpeg, 5.1 channels)

Encoded on an intel i7-2600K Overclocked @ 4.5 GHz. Even with this powerhouse (4 cores, 8 Threads) it took approx. 2.5 hours per episode. But it was worth it as the result is practically indistinguishable from the original 3.3GB files.
